src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Hello ARI , actually , it 's midday and I 'd like to go to the restaurant , what time does it open ? # greet ( ) ; request ( location ( cafe ) ) ; request ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) ; G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) ARI : At 11 AM . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) ) [start] RC : 11 AM , thank you . And , where is it ? Where should I go ? Is it upstairs or on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Thank you ARI . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . [MASK] ARI : How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Where can we eat at lunchtime ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : It 's ... yes , yes . I did n't quite understand . [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . You can order hot or cold sandwiches as well as hot or cold drinks . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Where are the toilets ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Right or left ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RC : I 'm in a wheelchair , are the toilets wheelchair accessible ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : Yes , absolutely . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) @ CG ( RC , get-info ( toilet ( is_accessible ) ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] RP : But what if I have an appointment in the morning ? ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So we do n't eat , we are n't offered breakfast ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Well , thanks anyway . [MASK] ARI : Thank you very much . [MASK] LC : Can you tell me where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Oh , but I do n't know . RP : Is room 17 on the ground floor ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Normally , I have an appointment . RP : I have an appointment in room 17 . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : So , where do the appointments take place ? Where are the appointments ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : I 'm afraid I ca n't help you . [MASK] RP : Do you have another number for me ? [MASK] RP : My appointment was scheduled for four o'clock . [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] RP : An appointment of ... gerontology . ARI : Of course . [MASK] RP : Where should I ... src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] LP : Hello I I 'd really like I 'm hungry I 'd really like to eat . And is the room air-conditioned ? The restaurant ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] [MASK] LP : So , Mrs companion , do you know what I 'll be eating today ? [MASK] [MASK] RC : Oh but no , I do n't know , I 'm going to ask . [MASK] RC : Can you tell us if there is a cafeteria ? We 've been very well received here , and I have no directions . I 'm looking for a cafeteria to have a coffee or a hot chocolate . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Can you tell me where on the ground floor ? Right , left , straight ahead ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Okay , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : Um also ... [MASK] LP : Um what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] [end] RC : Can you tell me the cafeteria opening hours ? Are there set opening hours ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . # inform ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ AG ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) RC : Ah , it opens at 11 o'clock ? # r-confirm ( cafe ( opening_times ( opening_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : And what time does it close ? # request ( cafe ( opening_times ( closing_time ) ) ) @ G ( RC , get-info ( cafe ( opening_times ) ) ) ARI : I 'm sorry , I do n't have this information . # cant-help ( cafe ( opening_times ( closing_time ) ) ) RC : Ah , that 's a shame , thank you . # give-feedback ( negative ) LP : Is there ... # incomplete-da ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Is there a lift to get to the cafeteria ? # request ( location ( lift ) ) @ G ( LP , go-to ( cafe ) ) RC : Um no , because it 's on the ground floor . # disaffirm ( ) LP : Oh ok. # acknowledge ( ) RC : But could you please tell us where the lifts are ? Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( lifts ) ) RC : Um for the lifts ? ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) RC : You already told me this for the cafeteria . So the lifts and the cafeteria are right next to each other ? ARI : Absolutely . # affirm ( ) RC : Oh , okay , thank you very much . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : See you around . Have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello . My name is ARI . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : Yes , I do . I have to go and see someone who 's hospitalised and I ca n't remember the ward . It 's room 17 . Can you please tell me where it is ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . # inform ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ AG ( RC , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Look , I have an appointment , but um , for my friend who is here . I ca n't remember the appointment time . Could you tell me ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . Where is the reception ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : I have an appointment at 5 o'clock in the cardiology department . I do n't know where that is . Could you tell me please ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . I 'll call a nurse to come and help you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you soon . Have a nice day . [MASK] [end] RC : Thank you , bye . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) LP : See you soon . You too , have a nice day . # bye ( )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Where is room 17 ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? You have to go to the reception . # cant-help ( ) ; suggest ( going-to ( reception ) )

src: [start] LC : Well , the treatment was , well the appointment was very quick . I 'd love a coffee now . Do you know where I could get one ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Um hello , we 'd like a coffee .
